Home.best-practices: Best Practices, Used with Raycast Extensions

UseRaycastExtension.title: Best Practices with Raycast Extension
UseRaycastExtension.install-extension-title: 1. Install the Just Color Picker Extension
UseRaycastExtension.paste-color-value-title: 3. Paste the color value into the Just Color Picker Extension
UseRaycastExtension.paste-color-value-description: After pasting the color value, you can see the color value and the color preview in the Just Color Picker Extension.
UseRaycastExtension.paste-color-value-description2: Once you have copied the color values, you can paste them into a code editor or design tool, or jump to the JustColorPicker tool station to make color adjustments.
UseRaycastExtension.use-it-to-your-heart-content: 5. As far as the eye can see, use it to your heart's content

FAQ.title: GOT QUESTIONS?
FAQ.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know, All in One Place

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: At JustColorPicker, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.

dataCollection.title: Information Collection
dataCollection.content: JustColorPicker does not collect any personal information or user data. We do not use cookies, tracking technologies, or any other means to gather information about our users.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our application does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

UsagePolicy.title: Usage Policy
UsagePolicy.introduction: This Usage Policy outlines the terms and conditions for using JustColorPicker. By using our application, you agree to comply with this policy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using JustColorPicker, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Usage Policy.

usage.title: Permitted Use
usage.personal: You may use JustColorPicker for personal, non-commercial purposes.
usage.commercial: Commercial use is permitted, provided you comply with this Usage Policy.
usage.modification: You may not modify, adapt, or hack the JustColorPicker application.

restrictions.title: Restrictions
restrictions.redistribution: You may not redistribute, sell, lease, license, or sublicense JustColorPicker.
restrictions.harmful: You may not use JustColorPicker for any harmful, abusive, or illegal purposes.
restrictions.illegal: You may not use JustColorPicker to violate any laws or regulations.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: JustColorPicker is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind. We are not responsible for any errors or omissions in the application.

changes.title: Changes to This Usage Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this Usage Policy at any time. We will notify users of any changes by posting the new Usage Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Usage Policy, please contact us.
